project_descr: The Umbrella Prgramme (Institutional Support for the Constitutional drafting process and promotion if inclusive participation)

outputs.output_descr: Provide for specific settings in which members of the constitutional committee can exchange ideas with international experts on the institutional planning of the constitution-making process, and on comparative approaches to constitutional issues.

1-	Provide for specific settings in which members of the constitutional committee can exchange ideas with international experts on the institutional planning of the constitution-making process, and on comparative approaches to constitutional issues.
2-	Coordination mechanism of international community in support of the constitutional process (UNAMI):
-	 Set up coordination mechanism for receiving and processing external inputs and  
       assistance to the Constitutional Committee  
-	Train staff on coordination of external inputs
Involving Iraqi Journalists in Public Debates on the Constitution; Support for a new Democraciees TV Film Festival (C9-10/F) UNDP

project_title: institutional support for the constitutional drafting
